metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30629 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Non-random values for ticket_age_add in session tickets in crypto/tlsbefore Go 1.17.11 and Go 1.18.3 allow an attacker that can observe TLShandshakes to correlate successive connections by comparing ticket agesduring session resumption.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.18 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2').
